channel.title: Ip
channel.description:
HOw do i change my ip it is the 12 thing in the begingng of that thing and it does not want to change can somebdy explain on how please and thank you[br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2007, 12:51:07 AM[/size][hr]Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into "advanced" (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the "gaming" button (is only left side for me...) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:
i dont understand this part can somebody explain it to me[br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2007, 01:12:51 AM[/size][hr]Also i do not have a gaming tab thing on my advaced thing so what do i do?

item.title: Ip
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

There is no different format for your IP, if you post your IP n the server status page people will be able to connect. If you are behind a router you need to configure it. If you dont know how to configure it download hamachi & use that.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip
item.dc:creator: @Koolkid5 Koolkid5
item.description:
@Koolkid5 wrote:

no i do not want to change the ip like that i mean by using the gaming format for to make the server to work so what do i do for that?

Read full topic

item.title: Ip
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

if you want to change your IP just unplug your modem.

If you have a static IP you cant change it.

Read full topic
